Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Componente della Redazione QA/Rivista dell’Associazione Rossi Doria {EconLit Journal} (2004 – 2014)
Associate Editor Regional Studies, Regional Science (2013 – to date)
Editorial Board Member Papers in Regional Science (2014 - to date) - Rivista Internazionale di Fascia A
Editorial Board Member Journal of Regional Science (2015-to date) - Rivista Internazionale Fascia A

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Invited Contributor to the Economics Working Group – LSE Commission for the Future of Britain in Europe, LSE, London, 12 May 2016 Invited Speaker, Plenary Session Chair and Discussant – "Regional Recovery and the EU Structural Funds", Workshop "Risk and Resilience: A Regional Perspective" Manlio Rossi-Doria Centre for Economic and Social Research, Roma Tre University, Rome (Italy) 31st May and 1st June 2016 Invited Speaker – "Foreign Direct Investment Networks in Europe and implications for Smart Specialisation", SMARTSPEC Thematic Seminar "Regional Positioning in international economic networks as opportunities for smart specialisation", Utrecht University (The Netherlands), 25 May 2016. Invited Speaker and Working Group Rapporteur - Ditchley Foundation Conference on "Growth and jobs in Europe: the way forward", Oxford, 19-21 May 2016 Discussant and External Expert – Workshop "Smart Specialisation Theory and Practice. Regional Planning and Developmen", Bucharest, 3-4 March 2016 organised by the Special Advisor to EC Commissioner for Regional Policy Invited Speaker – "Regional Quality of Government and Foreign Investment", Department of Land Economy Research Seminars, Cambridge University (UK), 24th February 2016 Keynote Speaker – "The Lazio Region in a Global Context. What Makes a Region Successful" – Stati Generali dell'Industria della Regione Lazio, Rome (Italy) 22nd February 2016 Keynote Lecture – “Multinationals and Regional Development”, School Seminar, University of Birmingham, 17th February 2016, Birmingham (UK) Invited Speaker – “Foreign Investments and the territorial dynamics of innovation in Brazil, Chile, Colombia and Mexico”, International Conference on ‘Territorial Inequality and Development’, January 25-27, 2016, Puebla, Mexico Invited Speaker – “Emerging Countries Multinationals in Europe”, Faculty of Economics and Business, University of Groningen, November 26th 2015, Groningen (NL) Invited Speaker – “The Location Strategies of Multinationals from Emerging Countries in the EU Regions”, Northeastern University, Centre for Emerging Markets Nardone Speaker Series, November 5th 2015, Boston (Ma). Keynote Speaker – “Effective Policies for Geographical Innovation Eco-Systems”, Competitiveness and Innovation Division, Inter-American Development Bank, October 2nd 2015, Brasilia, Brazil Invited Speaker – “Diversity in the European Union: Asset or Liability for Growth and Stability. ‘Smart’ growth, innovation and regional disparities in Europe”, Harvard Centre for European Studies, May 6th 2015, Harvard University, Cambridge (Ma) Keynote Speaker – “The Economic Geography of Innovation Agents”, Harvard Centre for International Development, CID Product Space Workshop, April 20th, 2015, Harvard University, Cambridge (Ma) Invited Speaker – “Labour mobility and innovation in the UK”, Weekly Seminar Series, Department of AED Economics, Ohio State University, April 17th 2015, Columbus (OH) Invited Speaker – “The Location Strategies of Emerging Countries Multinationals in the EU Regions”, Harvard Centre for International Development, April 6th, 2015, Harvard University, Cambridge (Ma)

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Lazio Regional Government (Italy), Assessorato allo Sviluppo Economico ed Attivitá Produttive / Lazio Regional Minister for Economic Development and Productive Activities with LSE Enterprise Ltd. • Research and Policy Report on “Multinazionali, Imprese Locali e Sviluppo Economico nella Regione Lazio”/”Multinationals, Local Firms and Economic Development in the Lazio Region” – Project Leader (July 2015- July 2016)

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Italian Section of the ERSA (European Regional Science Association) • “G.Leonardi” Prize for the best PhD thesis in regional economics (2007)

Presidency of the European Union, together with the European Commission DG REGIO and the Regional Studies Association (RSA) • Prize for the best paper presented at the ‘Challenges for the New Cohesion Policy’ Conference, February 2015

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Membro del Collegio dei Docenti del Dottorato in Economia (Denominazione del corso ECONOMIA - DOT13A7997), , Coordinatore Responsabile SALVATICI Luca, Ateneo: Università degli Studi ROMA TRE

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: University of California Los Angeles (UCLA), (CA) - Visiting Affiliate, School of Public Affairs (Jan.-Apr.2006)
European University Institute, (Italy) Jean Monnet Fellow, Robert Schuman Centre for Advanced Studies (Sept 2007 – August 2008)
Lecturer (Assistant Professor) in Economic Geography, Department of Geography of Environment (September 2008 – July 2013), London School of Economics and Political Science, UK
Associate Professor (Professore Associato) of Economic Geography, Department of Geography and Environment, London School of Economics and Political Science (UK)

Harvard University, Kennedy School of Government, (Cambridge, MA – USA) Visiting Scholar at the Taubman Centre for State and Local Government, Kennedy School of Government (September 2014 – August 2015)
Full Professor (Professore Ordinario) of Economic Geography, Department of Geography and Environment, London School of Economics and Political Science (UK)

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Abilitazione Scientifica Nazionale Bando 2012 (DD n. 222/2012) - Professore Associato nel settore 13-A2.

European Commission, Directorate General Regional Policy • Evaluation of the Main Achievements of Cohesion Policy Programmes and Projects over the Longer Term in 15 selected regions, From 1989-93 Programming Period to the Present [2011.CE.16.B.AT.015] Co-Investigator - Member of the Core Research Team, Responsible for Task 3 (Quantitative Analysis), LSE Enterprise, (2011-2013)

EU Seventh Framework Programme (FP7) • Collaborative Project (Small or Medium scale focused research projects): ‘Sharing Knowledge Assets: Interregionally Cohesive Neighbourhoods (SEARCH)’ [SSH-2010-2.2.-1] Co-Investigator - Member of the LSE research unit, (2011-2014)

EU Parliament, Directorate General for Internal Policies of the Union, • Study on the Impact of the Economic Crisis on the Economic, Social and Territorial Cohesion of the European Union [IP/B/REGI/IC/2013-018], LSE Senior Expert (2013-2014)
